TEXT.TITLE: DELUXE CHECK PRINTERS INC <DLX> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 50 cts vs 35 cts Net 42.7 mln vs 29.9 mln Revs 236.5 mln vs 218.2 mln Nine mths Shr 1.24 dlrs vs 1.02 dlrs Net 105.8 mln vs 86.9 mln Revs 702.5 mln vs 642.5 mln NOTE: 1987 nine-month earnings include nonrecurring gain of nine cents a share from sale of the company's Data Card investment.
